name: One-Button TETRIS
description:
The classic tetris gameplay, but you can use only one button. Play single player or up to 4 players using the same keyboard. Think fast and choose wisely because the time is ticking!

If you want to know how the sausage is made the source code is available. The game was created using the PureBasic programming language. You can also take a look at the game's github page.
